column3: I hope that I inspire women to believe in themselves, no matter where they come from; no matter what education they have; what particular background they originate from.

I never stop looking at this painting and its mysterious and beautiful women.

It's the same thing with trans people - we're all so different, we have different goals, different dreams, and different aspirations.
